definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: What I saw made me very sad.
sentences.chinese: 听说令堂去世，我非常难过。

sentences.english: We were ever so sad to hear that your mother had died.
sentences.chinese: 得知令堂去世的消息我们都很难过。

sentences.english: I have just learned with deepest sorrow and regret of the passing of your beloved mother.
sentences.chinese: 我刚知道令堂去世的消息，内心什感难过和遗憾。

sentences.english: How much juice do you need?
Say hello to your mother for me,don't forget it .
sentences.chinese: 代我向令堂问候，别忘了。

definition: uncle (affectionate name for a friend older than one's father)/old friend
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
